ABOUTME.NAME: Why me?
ABOUTME.DESCRIPTION: I'm a passionate frontend developer focused on user-friendly, responsive web applications. With a love for modern technologies and video games, I constantly expand my skills.

SKILLS.TITLE: My Skills
SKILLS.LEARNINGNEXT: I love constantly pushing my skills, discovering new technologies, and building real solutions from them. What is “state of the art” today may be outdated tomorrow — and that's exactly what makes this job so exciting for me.

PROJECTONE.TITLE: Portfolio Website
PROJECTONE.DESCRIPTIONONE: My personal portfolio website with Angular, animations, and i18n.
PROJECTONE.DESCRIPTIONTWO: My personal website with Angular and multilingual support.
PROJECTONE.DESCRIPTIONTHREE: My personal website with Angular and multilingual support.

PROJECTTWO.TITLE: 2D Game Engine
PROJECTTWO.DESCRIPTIONONE: A 2D game with Canvas & Vanilla JavaScript – including boss fights.
PROJECTTWO.DESCRIPTIONTWO: A game application with HTML5 Canvas and Vanilla JavaScript.
PROJECTTWO.DESCRIPTIONTHREE: A game application with HTML5 Canvas and Vanilla JavaScript.

PROJECTFOUR.TITLE: Discord Bot
PROJECTFOUR.DESCRIPTIONONE: A bot with commands and logging – hosted on my own server.
PROJECTFOUR.DESCRIPTIONTWO: A bot with commands and logging – hosted on my own server.
PROJECTFOUR.DESCRIPTIONTHREE: A bot with commands and logging – hosted on my own server.
